text: Tetroreopsis ciliata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Tetroreopsis. It was described by Breuning in 1940.Biolib.cz - Tetroreopsis ciliata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1940 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Tetroreopsis
